items.title: Taylor Swift Just Pulled Off Her Most Brilliant Move Yet. It Was 2 Decades In The Making
items.description: The singer repurchased her master recordings, giving her full control of her destiny.

items.title: Hackers Aren’t Just After Your Devices
items.description: Antivirus isn’t enough—hackers are after doors they can open.

items.title: Why PR Is Your Brand’s Best Defense in the AI Search Era
items.description: Be proactive in getting your company’s name and reputation established for more than just traditional search engines.

items.title: What Are the Keys to Customer Loyalty?
items.description: Rely on communication, trust, and community to build that relationship.

items.title: Entrepreneurs Like Their Work-Life Balance but Want to Improve It, a Survey Says
items.description: An Adobe poll finds most small-business founders are upbeat about their freedom and flexibility, but also want to reclaim more of their private lives.
